title: Junior Web Developer (Internship)
description: Developed and maintained web applications using React, JavaScript, and Node.js. Collaborated with senior developers to implement new features and fix bugs in existing projects.
achievements: Built responsive web applications with React and Bootstrap
Improved application performance by 30% through code optimization
Mentored 2 junior developers on best practices in web development

title: Team Lead - Web Development
description: Led a team of 5 developers in building open-source NLP tools for Bengali language processing. Managed project timelines, coordinated contributions, and ensured code quality through regular reviews and testing.
achievements: Successfully launched 3 open-source NLP libraries with 500+ GitHub stars
Organized monthly virtual meetups with 200+ attendees to discuss NLP advancements
Secured funding from local tech organizations to support ongoing development

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Currently developing a data analytics platform using React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL to help businesses make data-driven decisions. The platform includes interactive dashboards, real-time data processing, and integration with various data sources.
achievements: Developed a data analytics platform with real-time processing capabilities
Integrated multiple data sources to provide comprehensive insights for businesses
Received positive feedback from clients for improving their decision-making processes
